screen.name: location_management_screen
screen.description: Screen to view and manage saved locations.

components.description: List to display saved locations. Selecting an item sets it as the active location and navigates back to the Dashboard.
Button to delete a saved location.
Button to save the new order of locations and navigate back to the Dashboard.
Message displayed when no search results are found.

props.text: An error occurred during location addition.

components.description: Displays an error message when location addition fails.
List to display location search results.
Button to save the selected location.
Button to set the selected location as default.
Button to navigate back to the Dashboard Screen.

props.title: Confirm Deletion
props.message: Are you sure you want to delete this location?

components.description: Confirmation dialog for deleting a saved location.

component_types.name: TextInput
component_types.description: A text input field for user entry.

supported_props.name: value
supported_props.description: The current value of the input.

supported_props.name: onChange
supported_props.description: Callback function when the input value changes.

supported_props.name: placeholder
supported_props.description: Placeholder text for the input field.

supported_props.name: ariaLabel
supported_props.description: Accessibility label for the input.

component_types.name: TextDisplay
component_types.description: A component to display static or dynamic text.

supported_props.description: The text content to display.
supported_props.name: text

component_types.name: ConfirmationDialog
component_types.description: A dialog box to confirm user actions.

supported_props.description: Controls the visibility of the dialog.
supported_props.name: isOpen

supported_props.description: Callback function when the dialog is closed.
supported_props.name: onClose

supported_props.description: Callback function when the confirm button is clicked.
supported_props.name: onConfirm

supported_props.description: Title of the confirmation dialog.
supported_props.name: title

supported_props.description: Message content of the confirmation dialog.
supported_props.name: message

supported_props.description: Text displayed on the button.
supported_props.name: label

supported_props.description: Callback function when the button is clicked.
supported_props.name: onClick

supported_props.description: Visual style of the button (e.g., solid, outline, ghost).
supported_props.name: variant

component_types.name: LocationList
component_types.description: A list component to display search results.

supported_props.name: items
supported_props.description: Array of items to display in the list.

supported_props.name: onSelect
supported_props.description: Callback function when an item is selected.

supported_props.name: itemKey
supported_props.description: Key to uniquely identify list items.

supported_props.name: ariaLabel
supported_props.description: Accessibility label for the list.

supported_props.name: isReorderable
supported_props.description: If true, items in the list can be reordered.

supported_props.name: onReorder
supported_props.description: Callback function when items are reordered. Provides the new order of items.

component_types.name: IconButton
component_types.description: An icon button used to initiate a search.

supported_props.name: icon
supported_props.description: Name of the icon to display.

supported_props.name: onClick
supported_props.description: Callback function when the button is clicked.

supported_props.name: ariaLabel
supported_props.description: Accessibility label for the button.
